text: I fell in love with the culture and food and the only way I could go to Korea is through a job, I also love learning languages and it feels like a great opportunity. I believe that the way to work in Korea is if a company sponsors your visa. I will start off in London to build my showreel and study the language on the side . I was just hoping there was a way to go to Korea that I hadnâ€™t discovered yet. :blush:
